smurf_setup.config package¶

Submodules¶

smurf_setup.config.get_config module¶

class smurf_setup.config.get_config.SmurfConfig(filename=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Initialize, read, or dump a SMuRF config file. Will be updated to not require a json, which is unfortunate

get(key)[source]¶

Returns configuration entry for requested key. Returns None if key not present in configuration.

Args:
key (any): key whose configuration entry to retrieve.
has(key)[source]¶

Reports if configuration has requested key.

Args:
key (any): key to check for in configuration dictionary.
read(update=False)[source]¶

Reads config file and updates the configuration.

Args:
update (bool): Whether or not to update the configuration.
update(key, val)[source]¶

Updates a single key in the config

Args:
key (any): key to update in the config dictionary val (any): value to assign to the given key
write(outputfile)[source]¶

Dumps the current config to a file

Args:
outputfile (str): The name of the file to save the configuration to.

Module contents¶

This module handles the SMuRF setup config file.
